winter_mode.description:
Adds falling snowflakes on your screen. Get your home ready for winter! ❄️

If you have animations disabled in your device accessibility settings, this feature will not work.
winter_mode.disable_confirmation: Snowflakes will no longer fall on your screen. You can re-enable this at any time in Labs settings.
winter_mode.enable_confirmation: Snowflakes will start falling on your screen. You can turn this off at any time in Labs settings.
winter_mode.name: Winter mode

set_theme.description: Sets the default theme Home Assistant uses. Can be overridden by a user.
set_theme.name: Set the default theme
